mapper.select: SELECT u.id id, u.password password, u.name name, c.name curriculumName FROM users u, curriculum c WHERE u.curriculum_code = c.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, email, height, weight, gender, birth_date, profile_image, phone_number) VALUES (#{username}, #{password},#{email},#{height},#{weight},#{gender},#{birth_date},#{profile_image},#{phone_number})
